en: As you're preparing for the presentation, you realize you haven't gone over your business plan since before you started working. Now that you've been attempting to put it into practice, you know some of the goals you had are unrealistic. Take a day to revise the business plan?
You revise the business plan. It's annoying, but at least it's done.
You keep the plan as is. It's not too far off, and you might have to redo it anyways once investors are involved.
